cz.upol.inf.vanusanik.ministag.schedule

Class CoordinateTranslator

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.upol.inf.vanusanik.ministag.schedule.CoordinateTranslator

  • public class CoordinateTranslator
extends Object
    Coordinate translator helper. This helper class transforms between integer coordinate to real coordinated. It supports subspaces push-ins.
    Author:
    enerccio
